name: Getachew Kassa
description: '''Getachew Kassa''' ([[Amharic]]: ጌታቸው ካሳ; 6 September 1944 – 21 February 2024) was an [[Ethio-jazz|Ethiopian jazz]] singer and percussionist. He rose to famous during the 1960s and 1970s, after performing at the country's famous clubs, the Sombrino and Axum Hall. His music features in the [[Éthiopiques]] album series, alongside other musicians of the [[Ethiopian Golden Age of music|Ethiopian Golden Age]].
